statements: DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 AND sale_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM sales WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 5 AND price < 50;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 1001 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 500 AND phone_number = '123-456-7890';
